snippet.title: Bloodless - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Bloodless is a stylish retro, action-adventure game featuring fast-paced combat centered around ronin Tomoe's signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.

- Wishlist Bloodless here: https://3drealms.live/Bloodless
- Follow Point 'n Sheep on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pointnsheep
- Follow 3D Realms on Twitter: https://3drealms.live/3DRSocial
- Join the 3D Realms Discord: https://3drealms.live/Discord
- Join the 3D Realms Subreddit: https://3drealms.live/Reddit
- https://3drealms.com/
- http://slipgate-ironworks.com
